thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 26 of 3593
thread.title: Kari

author: Kari
title: Kari
text: I am so happy I found Thriftbooks!!!! I'm an avid book reader and I love that Thriftbooks has a WIDE selection of books to purchase for such a bargain. I found many books that I have not been able to find in years. As far as shipping and purchasing go, I give them a 10/10!!! You can't beat their $10 (if in US) free shipping deal!!! Even if you order under that amount you only pay $1 shipping per book and that's still an amazing deal. I just wish I would have found this amazing site sooner cause they have all the books from $3.59 on up (new and used) !!!! I have purchased from this company a couple times and my orders have always been on time and in good condition. I love Thriftbooks and will keep on continuing to buy books from them!!!!
